remarks: Lemma for ~ mapdord .  Ordering property of projectivity ` M ` . TODO:  This was proved using some hacked-up older proofs.  Maybe simplify; get rid of the ` T ` hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mapdord.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdord.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdord.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
mapdord.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdord.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdord.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
mapdord.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
mapdord.o $e |- O = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdord.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` U ) $.
mapdord.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
mapdord.c $e |- J = ( LSHyp ` U ) $.
mapdord.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
mapdord.t $e |- T = { g e. F | ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` g ) ) ) e. J } $.
mapdord.q $e |- C = { g e. F | ( O ` ( O ` ( L ` g ) ) ) = ( L ` g ) } $.
mapdordlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( M ` X ) C_ ( M ` Y ) <-> X C_ Y ) ) $.
$d F g $.
$d J g $.
$d K g $.
$d L g $.
$d O g $.
